context: The quince harvesting process in October and November.

MTL_expressions.description: Every day, from 7am the manager checks that the plantation has not been affected by codling moth.

propositions.description: Plantation not affected by codling moth.

MTL_expressions.description: If it is affected that day's production is interrupted.

ambiguities: The type of effect codling moth has on the plantation.

MTL_expressions.description: The employees begin to pick the fruits at 8am, when the quinces have almost no dew.
If the workers have not taken a break before 1pm, the manager reminds them that they should take a break soon.

propositions.description: Manager reminds workers to take a break.

MTL_expressions.description: 7 hours after the employees started picking the fruits, the trucks come and the employees load them at most until 5pm.
The supervisor notes down the spoiled fruit not later than 30 minutes after the trucks have been loaded.

propositions.description: Supervisor notes down the spoiled fruit.

MTL_expressions.description: In the evening, the supervisor reports the total number of kilos collected and the hours the employees have worked.

propositions.description: Supervisor reports the total number of kilos collected and the hours the employees have worked.

dependency_sequence.dependency_description: The proposition 'Production is interrupted.' depends on 'Manager checks the plantation.'
The proposition 'Manager reminds workers to take a break.' depends on 'Employees picking fruits.'
The proposition 'Employees loading trucks with fruits.' depends on 'Employees picking fruits.'
The proposition 'Supervisor notes down the spoiled fruit.' depends on 'Employees loading trucks with fruits.'
The proposition 'Supervisor reports total collected kilos & hours worked.' depends on 'Supervisor notes down the spoiled fruit.'

non_formalized_parts.description: The quince harvesting process takes place in October and November.
non_formalized_parts.reason_for_non_formalization: This statement sets the context but doesn't contain actions, events, or temporal relationships that can be translated into MTL.
